inn1.comm: appeal straightaway, lands it in line with middle and the bal hits him high on the pad, can't give that out
lands it on a length outside off and there's good carry to the keeper
Mortaza strikes! He gets lovely inswing in to the left hander and lands it on a full length, he shuffles to work it across to the on side, exposes his legstump and he's trapped in front
fires in a full delivery outside off and he gets his bat down and digs it out, Mortaza gets good pace here
gets good pace again, he fires it outside off and Sangakkara pokes forward and he's beaten all ends up
bowls him another jaffa outside off and he brings it much closer to the offstump, he did everything possible to try and induce an edge
lands it on a good length outside off and he taps it back to the bowler
strays on the pads and he shuffles and tucks it away to short fine leg
walks across his stumps and decides to shoulder arms on seeing the extra bounce
all too easy for the batsman, he slides it wide down the leg side and bowls it short, he has a wild swing at it and gets just enough bat to beat the keeper
gets a bit of late inward movement, he gets forward and forces it down to mid-on
gets across his stumps again and shoulders arms, this time the ball keeps a little low
gets good away movement off the pitch and he offers no shot

Mortaza's on fire! Mortaza gets that late inward movement again and cranks up the pace as well, he lands it on a yorker length and Sangakkara is very late in getting his bat down to keep it out and the ball crashes on to the off and middle stumps, the delivery is very similar to the one which claimed Tharanga
forces him to play straightway and a defensive push is enough to beat the bowler and mid-off
shuffles across his stumps just a touch and taps it back to the bowler
gets across his stumps and clips it away close to his pads to square leg
slips this one slightly wide down the legside and the keeper has to move across quickly to save it
gets well forward to chase a delivery which shapes away and the ball lobs off the full face of the bat and beats third slip, gully would have taken that easily
gives him width outside off to free his arms and he mistimes the cut to backward point
gets forward early and merely pushes it past the arc between cover and point, Raqibul gives the chase and he does well to slide and cut it off
shuffles and tucks it in front of square leg with soft hands, Jayasuriya scampers home
fires a yorker outside off and he fails to dig it out
pitches it up outside off and gives him plenty of room, he gets under it and scoops it high over mid-off, that's typical Jayasuriya
full outside off again but he bangs it straight towards mid-off
this one comes back in and hurries on him but he does well to clip it away wide of square leg
hits a good length on the offstump and he taps it away firmly towards cover
just holds the length back and he gets very encouraging carry to the keeper, the ball fizzes past the batsman's glove
this time he hangs his bat out and plays a very tentative shot and the extra bounce and movement beats him completely
bangs it in short of a length and it climbs on Jayasuriya, he steers it to point
slower in place and a tentative Jayasuriya shuffles across and shoulders arms
swings it on the pads, he moves across and whips it on the up down to fine leg
continues over the wicket, he fires it on a fullish length outside off and he thrusts his pad forward and watches it to the keeper
he errs by overpitching it outside off and Jayasuriya gets a big stride forward and smacks it over extra cover, that's not the length to bowl to him
angles it on the pads, he's cramped for room
grants him width again and the length and away movement is enough for Jayasuriya to get across and cut square of the wicket on the off side
he errs by overpitching outside off again and Jayasuriya reaches out to slam it over point but ends up scooping it squarer, third man mops up
cuts back in and shoots up, clips his pads and rolls away
plays a good length ball with an angled bat and comfortably steers it away wide of backward point
good running, he taps it away with soft hands towards mid-off, the ball deflects off Jayasuriya after the fielder takes aim  but they dont't take the overthrow
opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
lands it on a full length outside off and he gets his pad across and shoulders arms
slides it wide down the legside and he offers no shot
squares him up outside the offstump with a superb away swinging delivery
not a bad delivery to start off with, bangs it on a good length on the offstump and cramps him for room, he defends back to the bowler
shot, he bangs it in fractionally short, he swivels and clubs it well wide of mid-on
that's a cracker of a deliverym he swings it in sharply and fires that on a yorker length, he gets a thick inside edge on to his pads
gives him a bit of width outside off, swing and a miss
full and wide outside off, it's an invitation for Jayasuriya as he smashes it on the front foot and comfortably clears backward point and cover
slightly short and wide outside off and he mistimes the cut to backward point
rocks on the backfoot and taps it with soft hands and Jayasuriya pushes the single
Dropped Jayasuriya is squared up by the bounce and he tries to fend it away but the ball lobs off the top of the bat and dips towards Raqibul who runs forward from point, dives and fails to get to it
strays down the leg side and he shuffles and works it to fine leg
clips it with soft hands to the on side and charges off
gets nicely behind the line and then angles it away down to third man
gets his front pad across, turns the face of the bat and clips it behind square on the on  side
angles it towards the pads, he shuffles and clips it away towards fine leg
rocks back to a delivery which kicks up off a good length and he steers it just wide of point, he calls for the run quickly
inswinging full toss on the pads and he nudges it just wide of fine leg, he sprints and cuts it off just before the rope
bit of aggression there from Rubel as he bangs it in short and Mahela swings and misses it as he tries to hook
full in length on the body and he shuffles and clips it away off his pads
jams in a very quick bouncer outside and hurries the batsman as he just manages to dig it out
stays at the crease and the ball doesnt turn much, he tucks it to the on side
gets behind the line and steers it to the off side
tries ti pull but the ball rolls off his pads
thinks of taking a single to midwicket but Jayasuriya wisely sends him bac, Ashraful does well to dive and fire the throw to the keeper
rocks back and cuts to point
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and tucks it wide of square leg
strays wide down the legside, he pulls on the front foot but fails to beat short fine leg
skids on to him, he shuffles and clips an arm ball to short fine-leg
full and wide outside off and he gets on his knee and drives to deep cover
shuffles and works it to the on side
gets sharp turn inwards and he gets hit high on the pads
gets sharp turn inwards and he clips it away to fine leg
gets on his knee early and paddles it away down to fine leg on seeing the movement
gets forward and defends
fires that much quicker, he gets forward and defends
gets his pad forward and defends to the on side
flights it outside off, he gets beside the line and taps it down to backward point
shuffles at his crease and clips it away to fine leg
flights it on the pads and he gets behind the line and pushes it down to long-on
shuffles at the crease and clips it away late to the on side
lets the ball come on to him before pushing it to long-on
bowls it quicker, he gets well forward and defends
gets forward to work it to the on side but he plays too early and nearly chips it on the full to midwicket
works it to the on side
shuffles at the crease and turns it to the on side
shuffles at the crease and and clips it away to deep square-leg
flighted on  the pads, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
flights it on the pads, he shuffles and clips it away behind square leg
commits to the front foot early and steers it just wide of point
tries to force it past the bowler but Naeem slides to his right and cuts it off
gives him the charge and lofts him high over midwicket, two fielders converge and the ball just stops a bit before the rope
makes room, waits for the turn and cuts to the offside
angles it on the pads, he nudges it to the on side
defended to the off side

taps it in front of cover, they go through with a risky single and Naeem fires his thow just wide of the stumps, Mushfiqur dives to gather it and whips off the bails  and the third umpire takes a look, he's made it home
waits for the turn and clips it towards short fine-leg
flighted on middle, he gets forward and defends
flighted on middle, he gets forward and defends
clips him on the pads down the leg side as he tries to whip it away, he appeals
fires a full delivery on the offstump and he digs it out to point
slower through the air and he gives it a lot of flight, Jayawardene bends his knee and slogs him with the turn down to Rubel at deep midwicket
lands it on a good length and gets the ball to skid through, he shows the full face of the bat and forces it to long-on
slides down the legside, he shapes to sweep and misses
misses another sweep, another wide down the leg side
cuts it down to the sweeper cover fielder, Mushfiqur yells 'keeper' but the throw is very wide and Jayasuriya nearly collides with him on completing the second run
shuffles and tucks it to the on side
gets a couple of paces down the track and crashes it past extra cover, the ball scorches through the turf and beats both fielders in the deep
gets his pad across the stumps and clips it wide of midwicket
pushes it down towards long-off and Mushfiqur again pleads with the fielder to throw it to him
gets forward and taps it to the off side
shuffles and works it with the turn to the on side
makes room and cuts to the offside hut he fails to beat short third man
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
clips it with soft hands to the off side
gets forward and defends back down the pitch
takes a few paces down the pitch and pushes it to the covers
gets his pad across his stumps and pushes it to the on side
lands it on a good length on the offstump and he forces it back down the pitch
angles it on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side for his fifty, it's his 67th in ODIs, he has already passed 1000 runs against Bangladesh
appeal! he shapes to pull but the ball doesn't bounce as much and hits him high on the pad, Doctrove shakes his head
he picks the short length early this time, gets on top of the bounce and pulls it past square leg on one leg,he tried the same shot the previous ball

nice reflexes from Mortaza, he cleverly bowls the slower ball which stops on the batsman, he shapes to work it past the bowler but only succeds in tamely chipping it back to him, he dives forward, tumbles and completes the catch
opens the face of the bat and gets off the mark straightaway with a steer to third man
lands it on a full length on the offstump and he pushes it through the line to long-off
pitched up outside off and scooped towards short third-man
Dropped he gives him the charge and lofts towards Tamim at long-off who makes a mess of it, the ball nearly dribbles to the rope
floated on the pads and he works it with the turn to the on side
tries to work it to the on side and the leading edge just falls short of cover
angles it on the pads, he shuffles and works it to the on side
gives him width outside off and he chops it wide of point
angles it on the pads, he shuffles and clips it to the on side
close shout for an lew, lands just a shade outside off and comes back in, he's struck very close to the line of middle and leg
waits for the ball to come on to him and tucks it away very late close to his pads
gets forward and pushes it away wide of mid-off for a single
gets forward to a full ball and pushes it through the line to long-off
clips it away down to midwicket
fires it quicker, he defends it hard back to the bowler
pushes it quicker on the pads and he works it down to long-on
slower through the air, he works it towards mid-on
flighted on the pads, he gets across and places it wide of midwicket
and nearly gets a wicket, he fires it on a good length and Kapugedera shapes to cut but is cramped for room and nearly edges it to the keeper
short again and he flashes hard and carves it towards third man
cranks up the pace, he fires that on a good length and he gets behind the line and defends
angles it on the pads, he shuffles and clips it away down to fine leg, the fielder is too square to cut it off
angles it on the pads and he clips it towards fine leg
nearly gets his first wicket, he bangs it in short and the miscued hook just lands in front of fine leg
it's a very friendly full toss, angles it on the body and he bends his knee and clubs it over deep midwicket
gets well forward and steers it towards the covers

he tucks it softly towards short midwicket, pushes the single, he challenges Raqibul who slides to his left and in one motion fires the throw to Mahmudullah who whips off the bails, the third umpire takes a look
rank long hop but the doesn't pull it well enough to find the boundary on the on side
angles it on the pads and he shuffles and clips it away wide of square leg
tests him out with a bouncer, he swings and misses
clips it to the on side and sets off
gets behind the line and clips it to midwicket
taps it towards kid-on, sets off for the run and sends his partner back, Mortaza doesn't pick the ball up cleanly and he decides not to throw
he tries to pull a short ball straight over the bowler but it doesn't come off, he gets too early on the shot and the ball hits the top half of his bat and lobs tamely to Mortaza at mid=-on
angles it outside off and he glides it to third man, Mortaza does well to slide and cut it off
bangs it in short and he keeps him quiet
the ball skids through and cramps him for room, he tries to cheekily dab it away but gets a thick inside edge on to his stumps, Bangladesh are doing well to restrict Sri Lanka here
hits a good length outside off, he steers it down to long-off
funny looking shot, he bangs it in short and the ball comes on really quickly to thushara, he shapes to hook and changes his mind, he hangs the periscope out and tamely plays it back to the bowler
repeats the same ball and he shapes to mow it away across the line but misses
lands it on a good length outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
he errs by slipping it down the leg side, he shuffles and places it just wide of short fine leg, he bowls the wrong line and Kulasekara makes him pay
taps it towards short cover, he sets off but is later sent back

125 kph, he hits the deck hard and the batsman hooks him from the line of the offstump and tries to clear deep square leg, the ball seems to dip on Naeem but he falls forward and manages to hang on to it
gets carried away and bangs another one in short, this one really climbs and beats the keeper
bangs in another bouncer and this one sails over the batsman, Doctrove warns the bowler
persists with the short stuff and this time he fails to execute the pull properly
the bowler wins this battle, he bangs it in short of a length outside the offstump, he swivels and tries to hook and gets a thick edge to the keeper, seemed like a soft dismissal
angles it on the pads and he clips it to short fine leg
he opts to defend, he;s in no hurry
opens the face of the bat and steers it to short third man
tries to mow it over the on side but fails to make contact
poor delivery, full and wide outside off and he gets behind the line and crashes it past cover and extra cover
opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of short third man
the slower bouncer, he hooks a little too early and the ball lobs off his shoulder and lobs to the keeper, they appeal for a catch
full on middle and leg and mowed to long-on

he fires it on a full length on the offstump and Mendis shapes to smash that over the packed off side field but fails to get the desired elevation, he chips it to Ashraful who takes it over his head at short cover

inn2.comm: makes a lot of room and cuts wide of point
drops it short of a length and he swivels and pulls it away one one leg down to deep square leg
nudged to the on side

another one bites the dust, Thushara bangs it in short and angles it across the right-hander, he tries to dab it away and gets a thick edge and Sangakkara flings himself to his right, tumbles and takes the catch
bangs it on a good length on off and middle and he defends with an angled bat
Ashraful nearly gives it all away as he hangs his bat out to a ball angled across him and glides it wide of third slip

Bangladesh are in really deep trouble here, Tamim hops and fends off a good length ball towards point off his pads and sets off for a run which was never there in the first place, Kapugedera takes aim and Tamim wasn't even close to getting back
angles it on the pads and the ball trickles to the on side
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
gets across his stumps and pushes it back to the bowler
angles it across the stumps and he drives firmly to extra cover
short and wide, he gets across and spanks that in the air and right in to the gap between backward point and cover, the third man fielder gives up the chase
angles it on the pads and he works it away past the gap between mid-on and midwicket
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls it away down to fine leg
short and wide outside off, he chases it and mistimes the cut
gets behind the line and defends it back to the bowler
pulls and hits it firmly, he bangs it in short, Shakib swivels and finds the gap between midwicket and square leg perfectly
short and pulled away again, this time he gets more elevation and clears square leg, the ball sits up nicely for that shot
angles it on the pads and he works it away to fine leg
this one keeps a little low and he gets behind the line and defends
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
angles it on the pads and he gets his pad across and works it wide of midwicket
100 marks for placement there , he drops it fractionally short and Shakib swivels, gets under the bounce and pulls it in front of square, the fielder at deep square leg had no chance
he pitches it up outside off, he leans on to the drive and caresses it past the covers, that's three fours in the over
tries a cheeky glide and nearly gives his wicket away
tries to mow him across the line and the ball keeps low, clips his pad outside the line of the offstump and beats the keeper, Thushara appeals
shoulders arms outside off
shoulders arms outside off, there;s no movement
taps it on the front foot towards mid-off and sets off very quickly, he takes a chance with Murali but th under arm flick is wide
gets a half stride forward and defends to mid-off
gets well forward and smothers the spin
just strays on the pads and he trickles it to short fine leg
drifts on the pads again and he flicks it to deep square-leg
Big appeal! It pitches marginally outside the line of the legstump, he shuffles and tries to flick it away but the ball clips his pads, good decision in the end by Doctrove
slides on the pads and he tucks it to the on side
gets well forward and defends
what a shot, he errs by giving him width outside off, he reaches out and clobbers that on the front foot past the covers, the sweeper cover fielder dives in despair
shuffles at the crease and taps it back to the bowler
gets across his stumps to a good length ball and defends to the off side
the crowd's come alive, Mathews drops it too short and the bounce sits up nicely for Shakib who swivels and bludgeons it high over deep midwicket
the slower ball outside off, he reaches out and dabs it to third man
shuffles and works it to the on side
gets behind the line and punches it through the line to long-off
makes room, cuts to sweeper cover and brings up the 50 stand
angles it wide of the pads and wide called
doesn't get much turn and he defends to the off side
opens the face of the bat and angles it away to the off side
the sharp offbreak squares him up, he shapes to flick it away
another one skids through, turns away and beats the bat, Mendis only now starting to look threatening here
full on the pads and worked to the on side
he stays at the crease and waits for the ball to turn and come onto him before pulling
gets forward to a full ball and pushes it through the line to long-off
stays beside the line and defends
works it against the turn and places it to the on side
floats it on the pads, he gets his front pad across and nudges it to the on side
angles it on middle and leg and he tucks it to the on side
appeal for a lbw, lands just a shade outside leg and clips him on the front pad in line with the stumps, Doctrove again and good decision
shapes to pull but fails to make contact as the ball skids on to him
gives him a bit of width and cuts hard to the fielders in the deep on the off side
gets forward and steers it down to the covers
he takes his chances against Murali and sweeps against the turn and finds deep square-leg
angles it down the leg side and he fails to make contact with the sweep
steers it wide of backward point and pushes for the second run but he's sent back
he bravely tries to play him from the crease, the ball skids through and he just manages to dig it out to the off side
gets on his knee and slogs him over midwicket, he doesn't want Murali to settle
pushes him to the on side
exposes his stumps and goes for another wild slog but the ball nearly shaves the stump
full on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
gets forward early and tucks him away towards square leg
commits to the front foot and just checks his stroke a bit, he just manages to beat cover
lunges forward and defends to the off side
gets well forward, opens the face of the bat and steers it behind square on the off side
very good improvisation there, he exposes his stumps and plays a paddle scoop down to fine leg
full on the offstump and driven to the off side
drops it a fraction short, he rocks back at his crease and pulls it away to long-on
chips it in the air slightly but it's well short of cover
thrusts forward to defend and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
makes room and cuts the doosra down towards deep point
stays back at his crease and punches it wide f the bowler, that's an entertaining and very crucial 50 for Shakib, he simply has to stay there till the end
Mendis offers him some generous width outside off, he makes room and gets a thick outside edge past the vacant slips and shot third man
stays back at the crease and punches it towards mid-on
gets well forward and smothers the spin
angles it on the pads and he clips it away to long-on
commits to the front foot early and punches it to long-off
just opens the face of the bat and angles it away to point
now Ashraful joins the fun, Murali angles it towards middle and leg, he makes room and carves it nicely over extra cover
fuller in length and he makes room and crashes along the turf it to cover
pushes it to long-off
rocks back and mistimes the pull back to the bowler
rocks back and cuts with the turn to the sweeper cover fielder
punches it past the bowler and down the ground and he pushes for the second run
slides it wide down the leg side, he shuffles across to paddle it away and misses
strays on the pads and he shuffles and works it away to deep square leg
pitches outside off and he misses out on placing it to the off side
backs away a little and he bangs it in short, Ashraful fails to play a stroke
full outside off and driven straight to the off side

Ashraful succumbs to the hook, Kulasekara bangs it in short, Ashraful is lured on to the hook and he fails to the desired elevation, Jayasuriya runs across from fine leg, falls to his left and takes the catch, so Bangladesh lose a wicket against the run of play
angles it on the pads, he shapes to glance it to the on side but the ball skids through, clipshis pad and rolls to the off side
there's four of them, he makes a bit of room on seeing the turn and slices it easily past short third man, he picks his spot and finds the gap
makes room to cut but he chops it down to point
angles it on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side for a single
he bravely walks across his stumps, exposes all of them and plays another deliberate paddle scoop over the keeper
gets well forward and defends to the off side
gets on his knee, exposes his stumps and sweeps to long-on
awesome shot, he toys with the bowler by moving across and playing a controlled paddle scoop past the wivketkeeper, it was audacious and very effective
full outside off and defends to the off side
take that! Kulasekara bangs it in short towards the leg stump, he makes room and slaps it over deep extra cover, there was tremendous bat speed on that one,
strays on the pads and he clips it towards fine leg, he puts pressure on Murali
taps it with soft hands and sets off quickly
places it in front of mid-off with soft hands and sets off very quickly
defends softly to the off side and Raqibul sends his partner back
defends with soft hands again

very poor shot and an excellent catch by Murali, Raqibul goes for broke and tries to clear long-off, he plays away from the body and the ball is skied towards mid-off, Murali runs back, tumbles and takes a difficult catch
shuffles at the crease and whips it down to midwicket
gets beside the line and steers it to point and Shakib sends him back
same ball and the same result, he taps it to point
what a treat it is watching this guy bat, Murali comes round the wicket, he makes plenty of room and slams it square of the wicket on the off side, he finds the gap and beats sweeper cover
the quicker one, he chops it back to the bowler
tucks it off his pads to the deep on the on side
full on the pads and driven to long-on
take that again! Murali overpitches outside leg, he makes room and smacks it in the front foot with brute forces and crashes it past the arc between mid-off and cover
makes room to slam it again but finds short extra cover
very risky but he just clears the offside, he makes room to carve it over but it's just out of the reach of jayawardene at extra cover
gets on his knee early and paddles it away to fine leg
now Naeem gets in to the act, he charges down the pitch and drives him firmly past mid-off, in all the excitement he hugs his partner
going, going gone! Mendis overpitches on middle and leg and he takes a few paces down and lofts him through the line over long-on, there are several green shirts on the field
